info.name: Sample Zekr Bookmark
info.author: Mohsen Saboorian
info.desc: This is the default bookmark set with the Zekr standard installation. In this bookmark set, you can find a basic categorization of some well-know Quran ayas. The possibility of having multiple bookmark sets at one time, sharing, and exporting/importing bookmark sets is now available through the menu item "Manage bookmark sets".

folder.desc: Ayas related to the Mercifulness of Allah
folder.name: The Compassionate

item.desc: كَتَبَ عَلَى نَفْسِهِ الرَّحْمَةَ He has ordained mercy on Himself
item.name: He has ordained mercy on Himself

item.desc: لَا تَقْنَطُوا مِن رَّحْمَةِ اللَّهِ Do not despair of the mercy of Allah
item.name: Do not despair

item.desc: He it is Who accepts repentance from His servants... يَقْبَلُ التَّوْبَةَ عَنْ عِبَادِهِ
item.name: He accepts repentance from His servants

item.desc: Lord after that is Forgiving, Merciful
item.name: Lord after that is Forgiving, Merciful
He is the Beneficent, the Merciful

item.desc: نَبِّىءْ عِبَادِي أَنِّي أَنَا الْغَفُورُ الرَّحِيمُ
item.name: I am indeed the Oft-forgiving, Most Merciful

item.desc: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُ
item.name: And whoever trusts in Allah...

item.desc: وَمَا لَنَا أَلاَّ نَتَوَكَّلَ عَلَى اللّهِ
item.name: And what reason have we that we should not rely on Allah?
So when you have decided, then place your trust in Allah

item.desc: فَقُلْ حَسْبِيَ اللّهُ لا إِلَهَ إِلاَّ هُوَ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَهُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ
item.name: Allah is sufficient for me

item.desc: وَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا مِن رَّسُولٍ إِلاَّ بِلِسَانِ قَوْمِهِ
item.name: Language of his (own) people

item.desc: إِنَّ فِي خَلْقِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالأَرْضِ وَاخْتِلاَفِ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ لآيَاتٍ لِّأُوْلِي الألْبَابِ
item.name: Signs for men who understand
